title: Component: Bees
description: The entities currently in the beehive or bee nest.

min_ticks_in_hive.title: Mininum Ticks in Hive
min_ticks_in_hive.description: The minimum amount of time in ticks for this entity to stay in the hive.

ticks_in_hive.title: Ticks in Hive
ticks_in_hive.description: The amount of ticks the entity has stayed in the hive.
